This work aims to understand the potential for damaging environmental impacts in Antarctica. You can follow the work as it develops at [this website](https://dosull.github.io/antarctica), and also view slides from a recent talk [here](https://dosull.github.io/antarctica/talk/).

The approach I'm taking attempts to estimate 'desire lines' for human movement. Here's a typical output:
